entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as the one who threw an owl out into the storm. He is described as talking to Harry and Uncle Vernon in a normal manner.

entities.name: owl
entities.description: An owl is thrown out of the house by Hagrid into the storm.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is introduced as a Muggle who is angry and wants to stop Harry from being a wizard.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the one who is surprised by Hagrid's statement about him being a Muggle.

relationships.description: Hagrid threw an owl out into the storm.
